idea: We are an aeronautical startup at the ideation stage. We are a group of students aiming at providing different services like food deliveries, medicinal deliveries, surveillance, supplying essential items at high speeds for example medical samples for testing, medical reports, blood from blood banks etc. We also aim at providing the live footage from the drone to the police for surveillance purposes and also to reduce the crime rates. Also it can prove very helpful in maintaining social distancing during the current Covid-19 pandemic.
name: Team DroneLabz
